t: Criticism of Amazon - Wikipedia
s: 5 days ago - The company uses data from the marketplace which is unavailable to other retailers in that marketplace to determine which products to produce in-house and at what price point. Amazon markets products under AmazonBasics, Lark & Ro, and other private-label brands.

t: Having trouble getting some of our brands registered & getting no where with Amazon support. Does anyone have a direct contact, or resource, they can recommend? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): If you have the ability to register one brand that you own through Amazon’s Brand Registry, then you should have the ability to register twenty more. I am not sure of what mistakes you are making, so I will lend you some insight on the process and hopefully this will be enough ...

t: Who can create a Brand Store?
Amazon
s: I'm writing to you because I'm in trouble with my brand registry. I'm new on board, this is for my first product.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Detect and report suspected IP infringement with our powerful tools. Accurate submissions drive our feedback loops to block violations automatically—before they impact your brand or customers.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: amazon.ae - Report Infringement
s: Amazon Brand Registry provides access to powerful tools including proprietary text and image search, predictive automation based on your reports of suspected intellectual property rights violations, and increased authority over product listings with your brand name.

t: Amazon
s: The owner of the brand is Nike. ... If you're selling Nike products on Amazon without Nike's permission, then you are headed for trouble fast. Just search Nike on the forum, and you will see people posting about their accounts getting shut down because of it.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Amazon Brand Protection Report 2023: Protecting against counterfeits
s: March 26, 2024 - Our fourth annual report highlights four key areas helping to drive counterfeits to zero.

t: Amazon’s Brand Protection Report
s: June 8, 2022 - Dharmesh Mehta, vice president, Worldwide Selling Partner Services, shares Amazon's annual Brand Protection Report.

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 5 days ago - Nike confirmed to CNBC that its shoes are returning to Amazon.

t: Amazon releases its first Brand Protection Report
s: May 10, 2021 - Our first-ever report shows Amazon’s progress in driving counterfeit to zero in our store.
